reviewText: as a huge fan of storm chasers I was horribly upset when it went off the air.  having the DVDs almost makes up for it. this is a must have for any fan of tornadoes.
Title: Storm Chasers: Greatest Storms

reviewText: i haven't gotten this movie yet.  this guy is insane lol.  he never gives up on going on these dangerous quests for looking for dangerous tornados in kansas and texas lol.  and so he hears on the weather updates in texas, and then hears if there are any tornado warnings coming up, and then starts going onto these dangerous journeys looking for dangerous tornados.  i recommend this movie to everyone to watch , it's good to learn about these dangerous twisters, that hits certain areas in texas and kansas lol.
Title: Storm Chasers: Greatest Storms

reviewText: I  bought this as a Christmas present for my husband and he now loves the series so much I've ordered him Season 3.
Title: Storm Chasers: Greatest Storms

reviewText: I purchased the entire series of these DVD's; each of the 5 seasons.  I enjoy them - informative and fast action.  I am a weather buff so I do enjoy the weather information you learn when watching these DVDs.
summary: Very entertaining and easy to watch
Title: Storm Chasers: Greatest Storms

reviewText: great dvd from a great series,2 episodes what are part of season 4 but well worth having in your collection
Title: Storm Chasers: Greatest Storms
